description:
One of the members of Hero`s previoius party. After the split, she set out alone for the Demon Realm to look for him. Learning of it, the Hero starts looking for clues about her whereabouts during his travels through the Demon Realm. She has two other personalities - apparently her dead sisters` spirits - that can only be seen by her but manifest themselves through a change in her tone of voice to others.
The main personality, Silver (銀 - Gin), likes sleeping best and lies dormant most of the time.
The second personality, White (白 - Shiro), is really good in analyzing situations theoretically.
The third personality, Indigo (藍 - Ao), has a very wild and violent nature.
Source: en.wiki and jap.wiki
name: Onna Mahoutsukai
